Lecture 4: Perceptron & Generalized Linear Model


Sigmoid function

The perceptron function we are concerned with is: Signum.

In a way a signum function is a hard-version of the sigmoid.

Now the hypothesis function of the signum function is where is the parameter and is the input.

The hypothesis function of the sigmoid function is .

They have an update rule which looks the same: except mean different in both of them. It’s also same in linear regression as well.

Now can have a value of:

  • 0 if the prediction is correct.
  • +1 if is 1, the prediction is wrong.
  • -1 if is 0, the prediction is wrong.
